createTestUser(address).details: allows owner to create test users for contract testing. Test users will always have the twitter handle ***TEST_USER*** so that they are easily recognizable as a test user*

fulfill_verify(bytes32,uint256).details: Called by the oracle once the verification job is complete*

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verifyUser(string).details: submit a verification job to the oracle. Users latest tweet must contain the address they called this function with!!!*
